name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was in a fabulous location overlooking the bay. We loved the view. Everything was relaxing, and peaceful. The room was clean and quite large with settee and free satalitte tv. The evenings were very peaceful even though there were a few musical entertainments and barbeques on the beach they finished at quite reasonable times.
reviews.title: Sun Sand Sea and Spa

likes.liked: — Spacious with places to sit and eat both inside and outside
likes.disliked: — Travelling to main towns and cities of Malta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had half board and the food at the flavours restaurant was buffet style and a good quality. We were slightly disappointed when we went to essence 5 star - the food was excellent but we were sandwiched between a private party in the ballroom and the beach party so this affected the mood. This was a contrast to the flavours restaurant which was in the middle of the three towers and so not near any noise.
reviews.title: Definate pro's and con's

reviews.text: We were able to travel around the island by bus and this was very cheap and cheerful. The spa and treatments were lovely including massage on the beach.
reviews.title: Beautiful resort, but has some service challenges

likes.liked: — The area landscaping, Mediterranean, pool, suite, the view

reviews.title: Great hotel, miles from nowhere - 15 minutes taxi ride from "local" restaurants.
reviews.text: I read the reviews of this hotel before going and was a bit wary given the very mixed ratings people have given.
Overall I think this is a nice hotel and would stay there again - if the price was right/ it was a good deal.
reviews.title: Golden Sands, Malta

reviews.text: This hotel is in a lovely locaiton - away from the tower blocks and development. It has a good feel - there was a tree planting weekend whilst we stayed. Beautiful rooms and despite the moody weather we couldnt have had a more relaxing time. The reception staff, particularly Jenna, are exceptional and make you feel very welcome. The spa offers great treatments - we sampled 2, although the staff there need some serious training. I completed a comment card and 2 of them tried confronting me and wanted me to discuss it with them! All handled in rather an intimidating way. I said I would be happy to discuss with the management - but they never called (these 2 said they were the management, so I am not surprised!) Aside from this our stay was most enjoyable and I would recommend the resort and deserted swimming bay nearby for a rejuvenating break prior to Christmas. Needless to say, Malta is seeped in history and the locals a joy to interact with - so the odd rainy day in November does not matter at all!
reviews.title: Hotel and Spa service differentiation

likes.disliked: — the separately owned spa customer service

reviews.text: stayed there for a week very clean lovely hotel food good staff friendly beach lovely for a 5 star the prices did not reflect this i found food and drink cheap only problem i had was the kids club put my daughter in for an hour and went back to get her and she been crying all that time they never came to look for me which i was not happy about she was the only child there with three staff but all in all a lovely hotel
reviews.title: nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Won this holiday so I didnt mind that the quality of the accommodation wasn't really a 5*.
reviews.title: Does not rate a 5* more 4* at a pinch!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1st morning there the shower head came off, the toilet wouldn't flush, only one pair of slippers in the bath robe and the flannel vanished the next day and never re-appeared. The air conditioning unit would cut off 2/3 times during the night so we gave up and just left the overhead fan on and the window open.
reviews.title: One week at this hotel, only 4 good nights...

likes.disliked: — the 9 ft wall blocking the view of the ocean and country side.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It took a whole day before someone finally turned up to sort out the shower head.
reviews.title: i've had better holidays!

likes.disliked: — the staff, could have had better facililties in the room eg kettle and toaster was poor standard

reviews.text: As a member of The Islands Residence Club I have stayed here a number of times. Each visit I have always found all the staff to be extremely friendly and helpful, this includes Reception, Bars and Restaurants, Maids, Security, Concierage, Deli, Salon and Beach staff, but special mentions go to Marco, Mario and Stephanie in Swizzles, Richard on the beach and a guy who works in the Salon, who's name i don't know, for their professionalism and friendliness at all times. The view from the Hotel over Golden Bay is breath taking and I know I'll never get fed up of it. The Hotel is clean and modern with excellant facilities . I look forward to next years visits.
reviews.title: What a view

reviews.text: We 'won' a week's stay at this hotel with Island Residence Club - on the proviso that we attended a promotional tour of the hotel and time share options available.
reviews.title: Very Nice - But Expensive

likes.liked: — Staff in the resturant were great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have 2 children under 4 so we upgraded to Half Board when we arrived as we had heard that there were not many other options available and our room had no s/c facilities. The upgrade for the week as 630 Euros (just for 2 adults and under 5s eat free) which was expensive.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

likes.liked: — It was clean and we had a kitchen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Flavours buffet resturant was very good, the chefs would cook the children whatever they wanted, and the selection of main courses was very good, carvery every day, fresh cooked pasta / noodles to order, and a fantastic selection of desserts.
reviews.title: Not exactly 5 star... except for the location

likes.liked: — the views and how clean the room was

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was not ideal for a young family, there was no bath, the tiles in the bathroom were incredibly slippery for small children when wet, the patio doors did not lock, there was only a mini-bar (no fridge) but the hotel didn't charge us for removing the bottles on the top shelf and using it to store baby milk.
reviews.title: A 5* resort hotel with something for everyone.

likes.liked: — Clean and well-appointed. Good yet unobtrusive service.
likes.disliked: — Strange smell on 7th floor Sunrise block for last 3 days.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I visited Golden sands on a timeshare promotion deal with Island Residence Club/Resort Properties for a chill holiday, arriving at the end of March. On the timeshare side, we own holiday rental property and a good timeshare in Europe so we had an idea of what to expect. However we were surprised that the process here was so intensive. We did meet one long term owner who was happy with the resort, but the figures did not stack up to me and our rep was very rude to us when we said no.
reviews.title: Timeshare and conference centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You would be wise to ignore the pressure of "it has to be done right now!" in the presentation and, if you do think timeshare here is for you, do some research on the Internet and talk to existing owners first to make an educated investment.
reviews.title: Been there done that Raddison Golden Sands Malta

reviews.text: Golden Sands is really two things; a Radisson business centre (it has extensive conference facilities) and a time-share residence. Its not really geared for holiday-makers looking for a pure vacation hotel, nor is it 5 star in every respect.
reviews.title: Great hotel, but remote
